newsitem.title: USA: Oregon Metallurgical sets tax refund div. [CORRECTED 22:30 GMT]
newsitem.headline: Oregon Metallurgical sets tax refund div. [CORRECTED 22:30 GMT]

text.p: Oregon Metallurgical Corp delared Thursday a special tax refund dividend to be paid on December 20 to shareholders of record as of November 27, 1987.
The dividend is related to a federal tax refund and net of expenses will be $0.5227 a share.
The special tax refund relates to a long-standing tax refund claim, which was recently settled with the Internal Revenue Service.
Oregon Metallurgical is an integrated producers and distributors of titanium sponge, ingot, mill products and castings for use in the aerospace, industrial, golf and military markets.
